name: MKLocalSearch.Request
desc: The parameters to use when searching for points of interest on the map.

items.name: init(completion: MKLocalSearchCompletion)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a search request based on the specified search completion data.

items.name: var naturalLanguageQuery: String?
items.desc: A string containing the desired search item.

items.name: var region: MKCoordinateRegion
items.desc: A map region that provides a hint as to where to search.

items.name: var pointOfInterestFilter: MKPointOfInterestFilter?
items.desc: A filter that lists point of interest categories to include or exclude in search results.

items.name: var resultTypes: MKLocalSearch.ResultType
items.desc: The types of items to include in the search results.

items.name: typealias MKLocalSearch.Request.ResultType
items.desc: Options that indicate types of search results.
